message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6000.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of the value it brings. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway last time. I'm willing to do the same this time, so I can offer $7500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob! However, I still think the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $9500 this time.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $7000 for the product.
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $8200 this time.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $7500 for the product.
I've already compromised a lot, Bob, and I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one final offer: $8000. If you're still interested, this is my last price.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit of a discount. I'm willing to offer $7800 for the product.
